content: >at first glance this crocheted beauty looks like just another striped afghan but take a closer look and you ll see that designer edie eckman s granny stripes afghan is an intriguing pattern that emulates bands of cheery rick rack stitched in 7 complimentary shades of always soft simply soft the granny stripes afghan is a keeper gauge in pattern stitch four 3-double_crochet groups and 9 row = 4 /10cm want to chat about your project or have a pattern question join the edie eckman stitchers 1 group like to crochet work through unusual motif designs at the beyond the square crochet-along 2 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/edie-eckman-stitchers 2 http //www ravelry com/groups/bts-crochet-motif-cal
